title: Which is faster, QR codes or barcodes? - Quora

response.answer_text: QR Codes, considering the amount of information they can carry. This is also dependent on the type of scanner you are using. There are some pretty fast laser linear scanners and there are some pretty fast “imagers” (most notably, from Honeywell). You may tell us the details of your case in order to give a more precise and better justified answer

A QR code can carry up to some hundred times the amount of information a conventional barcode is capable of. When comparing the display of both: a conventional barcode can take up to ten times the amount of printing space as a QR code carrying the same amount of information.
